remarks: The transformed values of a (finite) mapping of integers to matrices. (Contributed by AV, 4-Nov-2019.)
statement:
m2pmfzmap.a $e |- A = ( N Mat R ) $.
m2pmfzmap.b $e |- B = ( Base ` A ) $.
m2pmfzmap.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
m2pmfzmap.y $e |- Y = ( N Mat P ) $.
m2pmfzmap.t $e |- T = ( N matToPolyMat R ) $.
m2pmfzmap $p |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring /\ S e. NN0 ) /\ ( b e. ( B ^m ( 0 ... S ) ) /\ I e. ( 0 ... S ) ) ) -> ( T ` ( b ` I ) ) e. ( Base ` Y ) ) $.
